heading: Heretics Asylum Dungeon Guide
content: Heretics Asylum is a dungeon in western Kehjistan that grants the , an essential aspect for barbarians dealing damage with Charge or Leap. The first zone demands a lot of backtracking and may have Animus Carriers tucked into the corners of cells. Finding Scar Gundror to obtain the Maximum Security Key is randomly fast or slow depending on how soon you encounter him. Best to find somewhere else to farm after clearing this dungeon once. While every dungeon has a somewhat randomized layout, there are patterns to where objectives and bosses are located. This map will help you identify those layouts so you can complete dungeons faster and maximize your XP and loot per hour! Reviewed by
